content:
{"name": "Resources for Independent Living SALEM OFFICE", "alternate_name": "", "description": "NEED HELP PAYING FOR GROCERIES?
Families need to complete the 2024-25 school meal & summer EBT application to receive summer benefits ($120 per eligible child)- name spelling, address, etc. all need to be up to date and accurate! Summer EBT Outreach Toolkit" https://hungerfreenj.org/summer-ebt-2024/
See what SNAP can do for you.
NJ SNAP (Supplemental Nutrition Assistance Program) is New Jersey's food assistance program to help you buy the groceries to eat and be healthy. Even if it is only for a few months, NJ SNAP can help you feed your family.
Representatives are available to answer your questions about SNAP and help you with your application. You can find us at:
Resources for Independent Living Burlington Co. 609-747-7745 Cumberland Co. 856-825-0255
Salem Co. 856-678-9400
Cape May Co. 856-825-0255
To make the application process quicker and easier, bring with you, as applicable:
Proof of income
Proof of address
Cost of rent and utilities
Child or adult care expenses
Medical expenses (if age 60+ or have a disability)
You should never be asked to pay for assistance to fill out an application. There is no charge.", "email": "", "url": "https://rilnj.org/njsnap-program/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "193 North Broadway", "address_2": null, "city": "Pennsville", "state_province": "NJ", "postal_code": "08070", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.6649794, "longitude": -75.50925180000002}, "phones": [{"number": "(856) 678-9400", "type": "voice"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}]}
